message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that this product will bring significant value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $10500. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
